//tahseen anwar tahir


public class t9 {

	/**
	 * @param args
	 */
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int i,j;
		for(i=0;i<3;i++)
		{
			for (j=3;j>i;j--)
			{
				System.out.print(" ");
			}
			for(j=0;j<=i;j++)
			{
				System.out.print(j+1+"");
			}
			System.out.println();
		}

	}

}
